LocationXmm.description: The location of the sensor, in millimeters, along the X axis from the logical reference point.

LocationYmm.description: The location of the sensor, in millimeters, along the Y axis from the logical reference point.

LocationZmm.description: The location of the sensor, in millimeters, along the Z axis from the logical reference point.
